document_data.name: Nevalle
document_data.mainbody: '''Nevalle''' was a male [[human]] [[fighter]], and a member of the [[Neverwinter Nine]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Description: Nevalle was a very handsome man, with a chiseled physique to match. He had blonde hair and light skin, and wore the rich, blue attire of the Neverwinter Nine.
